comments: Full health lounge Flu and seasonal vaccinations campaign Cover 3 cases knee joint replacement. Medical checkup once a year for VIP class up to RS6,000 Chronic medication without prior approval and to be obtained from appointed pharmacies. Claims settlement to be processed within maximum 10 working days. Cover all reimbursement cash claims based on policy benefits. Dental and Optical reimbursement to be allowed. Nebulizer machine, Diabetes devices and high blood pressure devices to be provided upon doctor prescription. Chronic medication and tele/app services to be available for all classes. Epidural Injections to be covered. Medical consultations for chemotherapy and radiotherapy. Ophthalmologist consultations covered up to annual limit RS. 1,000,000. Ex-gratia fund: RS. 250K. Caesarean delivery to be covered up to annual limit RS. 1,000,000. Physiotherapy sessions to be covered. The coverage starts from the request date regardless if any delay in card issuance. Pre-approval: VIP: not required. A, RAS 2,000. B, 1B and C: RAS 1,000. Change of class is allowed for all classes within 90 days without justification / documentation. After the period of 90 days, change of the class will be subject to promotion/demotion letter from GASCO. If the treatment is not available in the providers network hospitals, insurer should refer to the nearest tier one hospital or to any superior hospital outside Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, if necessary Submission of Eligible Claims for reimbursement: In – KSA claims within 90 days from date of service. Out-KSA claims within 180 days from date of service. Apply a grace period to Add the parents within 60 days from the employee inception. Adding the parents of any employee who has got an official promotion from GASCO or requested from Gasco CEO’s. Insurer to notify immediately any treatment above SAR 50,000. Adding the providers during policy period upon request. Apply to move the members with their claims between the CRs and policies without any financial impact. - Class A, B, 1B: Outside Hospital Network 10% maximum limit (100 S.R.). Class C: Mandatory Provider Network(MPM) maximum limit (0 S.R.). Outside Hospital Network(OHN) maximum limit (50 S.R. ). Outside Complex Network(OCN)maximum limit (0 S.R.). - Other than 4 installments policy should not freeze for balances due to outstanding endorsements. Insurer must provide Quarterly Row data shows all expenses subject to CCHI conditions - Adding the providers during the policy period upon review WT NW - Emergency treatment out KSA: Covered 100% on actual expenses up to first S.R 50,000/- and any cost over above is covered subject to the cost of similar medical procedures at benchmark provider for each class (Al Habib for VIP class Dallah hospital for class A, B 1B). - Non-emergency treatment out KSA and/or network: Covered 100% of the actual cost subject to the cost of similar medical procedures at benchmark provider for each class (Al Habib for VIP class Dallah hospital for class A, B 1B). -

sub_coverages.description: Appointed Pharmacy for Chronic Medications Supply
Organ Transplant for Heart and Liver (covered in KSA only)
Vaccination of Children as per MOH Specification
Repatriation of Mortal Remains to Home Country
Companion Expenses for Children less than 12 yrs. Old
Ear Piercing For Female New Born Babies
Cost of Acquired valvular heart disease
Expenses of Organs Donation Operation for the donor
New born babies national Preventive Program
Psychiatric Treatment for Acute Cases of Psychological Disorders
Expenses of Complication of Cardiac Valve replacement
screening for hearing Impairment and critical congenital heart malformation in newborns.
Costs of infant formula (baby milk powder) in need of medical care up to the age of 24 months to become free of charge.
Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) immunization program for children according to the Ministry of Health approved immunodeficiency virus vaccines schedule.
Delivery complications are covered up to the maximum benefit limit of this policy.
Cost of newborns coverage on the mother's policy up to a maximum of 30 days from the date of birth until they are added in the policy on retroactive basis from the date of birth
Adult Vaccination based on National Vaccination Schedule for Adults
Sexually transmeted diseases Include cover for Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genetic warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genetic herpes, Chancroid
The costs of complications resulting from a benefit treatment covered in the policy
Treatment of root canals and emergencies
Miscarriage/Legal Abortion, Caesarian and Complications of Delivery/Pregnancy

endorsements.message: You have been appointed for this policy under class(4)
